item.title: 先锋集团在日本国债大规模抛售前撤出投资
item.description: 先锋资产管理有限公司曾是日本政府债券的最大买家之一，但今年年初暂停了对该国长期债券的持续购买。【原文：Vanguard Asset Management Ltd., previously one of the biggest bulls on Japanese government debt, hit pause on a steady buying spree of the nation’s long-dated bonds at the start of the year.】

item.title: 人工智能初创公司Baseten以50亿美元估值完成3亿美元融资
item.description: 据知情人士透露，人工智能初创公司Baseten Labs Inc.以50亿美元估值完成3亿美元融资。【原文：Artificial intelligence startup Baseten Labs Inc. has raised $300 million at a $5 billion valuation, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 汇丰警告日元风险溢价飙升难有简单解决方案
item.description: 日本政府支出激增与通胀卷土重来的担忧正导致日元与美元及政府债券收益率的传统关联关系瓦解，促使汇丰控股有限公司策略师们调整了对日元未来数月走势的预测。【原文：Fears of steep government spending and resurgent inflation in Japan are driving a breakdown in the yen’s traditional link to the dollar and government-bond yields, prompting HSBC Holdings Plc strategists to reverse their forecasts for the Japanese currency in the months ahead.】

item.title: 日本"痴呆症资金"危机危及数万亿美元
item.description:
日本数万亿日元资产由面临认知能力衰退风险的人群持有。在今日的《亚洲大观》播客中，我们将探讨这场"痴呆资金悬崖"对日本乃至全球经济意味着什么。

【原文：

Trillions of dollars in Japanese assets are held by people at risk of cognitive decline. On today’s Big Take Asia podcast, what this “dementia money cliff” means for the nation and the broader global economy.

】

item.title: 格陵兰与日本恐慌冲击低迷交易，市场暴跌
item.description: 当金融市场陷入异常平静的状态——股市逐周缓慢攀升，债券收益率在窄幅区间徘徊——华尔街许多人开始为突如其来的剧烈震荡做准备。【原文：As financial markets settled into an unusual state of tranquility, with stocks slowly grinding higher week after week and bond yields hovering in narrow ranges, many on Wall Street started to prepare for a sudden jolt.】

item.title: 无人机配送初创企业Zipline估值达76亿美元
item.description: 无人机配送与物流初创企业Zipline已完成超过6亿美元的新一轮融资，估值攀升至76亿美元，该公司正加速推进商业部署。【原文：Zipline, a drone delivery and logistics startup, has raised more than $600 million in new funding, boosting its valuation to $7.6 billion, as it expands commercial deployments.】

item.title: 力拓铜产量攀升，奥尤陶勒盖矿投产提速
item.description: 力拓集团铜产量作为其增长计划的关键支柱，在第四季度增长了5%，这得益于其蒙古奥尤陶勒盖矿区的持续扩张。与此同时，其核心皮尔巴拉铁矿石业务在去年最后三个月创下产量纪录。【原文：Rio Tinto Group’s copper production, a key plank of the miner’s growth plans, climbed 5% in the fourth quarter thanks to the continued expansion of its operation at Oyu Tolgoi in Mongolia, while iron ore production at its core Pilbara operations hit a record in the last three months of the year.】

item.title: KKR有望突破200亿美元美洲收购基金目标
item.description: 知情人士透露，KKR & Co.在完成其旗舰美洲私募股权基金的募资后，该基金规模将突破200亿美元目标，创下该策略的募资纪录。【原文：KKR & Co. will surpass its $20 billion target for the firm’s flagship Americas private equity vehicle after it wraps up fundraising, setting a record for the strategy, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德称特朗普最新威胁令不确定性卷土重来
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜·拉加德表示，由于唐纳德·特朗普最新关税威胁，不确定性已然重现。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said uncertainty has returned due to the latest tariff threats by Donald Trump.】

item.title: 奈飞2026年将增加节目支出，利润承压
item.description: 网飞公司公布的第四季度业绩基本超出华尔街预期，但对未来数月前景持谨慎态度，称节目制作支出增加以及与华纳兄弟探索公司达成交易的成本上升。【原文：Netflix Inc. delivered fourth-quarter results that largely beat Wall Street estimates but issued a cautious forecast for the months ahead, citing higher program spending and the cost of closing its deal with Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.】

item.title: 波音股价有望收复2024年空中事故造成的损失
item.description: 波音公司股价正逐步收复2024年1月旗下客机空中险情事件造成的损失，这表明投资者对首席执行官凯利·奥特伯格领导下的公司转型持续保持信心。【原文：Boeing Co. shares are on track to recoup their losses following the midair near-disaster involving one of the company’s jets in January 2024, a sign that investors continue to gain confidence in a turnaround under Chief Executive Officer Kelly Ortberg.】

item.title: 玻利维亚因此前存在违规行为收紧黄金购买规则
item.description: 玻利维亚央行已重启国内开采黄金的购入计划以充实外汇储备，同时引入新的美元参考价格及更严格的指导方针以规避违规操作。【原文：Bolivia’s central bank has resumed purchases of domestically mined gold to bolster foreign reserves, introducing a new US dollar reference price and stricter guidelines to avoid irregularities.】

item.title: EQT计划将现有风险投资持股整合至新基金
item.description: 私募股权公司EQT AB正计划将首支风险投资基金的资产转移至新投资工具，此举正值初创企业股权二级市场扩张之际。【原文：Private equity firm EQT AB is looking to shift assets in its first venture fund into a new vehicle amid the expansion of the secondary market for startup stakes.】

item.title: 金树资本斥资2亿美元押注萨克斯破产救援贷款
item.description: 金树资产管理公司将认购萨克斯全球企业公司10亿美元破产融资中的一部分，押注这家标志性百货公司能成功完成第11章破产重组并规划未来发展路径。【原文：GoldenTree Asset Management will buy a chunk of a $1 billion bankruptcy financing for Saks Global Enterprises, in a bet that the iconic department store will make it through Chapter 11 and chart a path forward.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会将就法院对Meta垄断案胜诉的裁决提起上诉
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会发言人周二表示，该机构将就联邦法官关于Meta Platforms Inc.在社交网络领域不构成垄断的裁决提起上诉。【原文：The US Federal Trade Commission will appeal a federal judge’s decision that Meta Platforms Inc. doesn’t have a monopoly in social networking, an agency spokesman said Tuesday.】

item.title: 黑石集团拟以逾50亿美元出售Beacon Offshore业务
item.description: 知情人士透露，黑石集团正处于评估出售Beacon Offshore Energy的初期阶段。这家墨西哥湾钻井公司由黑石持有约十年，其出售价格可能超过50亿美元。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is in the early stages of weighing a sale of Beacon Offshore Energy, a Gulf of Mexico driller it’s owned for about a decade that could fetch more than $5 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: XAI联合创始人杨因莱姆病确诊离开马斯克初创公司
item.description: 埃隆·马斯克初创公司xAI的联合创始人之一格雷格·杨，在被诊断出患有莱姆病后，将从该公司离职。【原文：Greg Yang, one of the co-founders of Elon Musk’s startup xAI, is stepping down from the company after being diagnosed with Lyme disease.】

item.title: 市政债券因供应增加及地缘政治担忧而下跌
item.description: 市政债券创数月来最大跌幅，因供应开始增加，且地缘政治担忧重创美国国债市场。【原文：Municipal bonds are dropping the most in months as supply starts to pick up and geopolitical concerns hammer the US Treasury market.】

item.title: 达沃斯科技高管强调人工智能作为地缘政治工具的力量
item.description: Anthropic首席执行官达里奥·阿莫代将人工智能芯片比作核武器。谷歌DeepMind首席执行官表示中国技术仅落后美国数月。Signal的梅雷迪思·惠特克称人工智能的新应用具有独特的"危险性"。【原文：Anthropic’s Chief Executive Officer Dario Amodei compared artificial intelligence chips to nuclear weapons. Google DeepMind’s CEO said China’s technology is just months behind the US. Signal’s Meredith Whittaker called new adaptations of AI uniquely “perilous.”】

item.title: 纽约预算未包含备受担忧的百万富翁增税计划
item.description: 纽约州长凯西·霍楚尔今年不会提高个人所得税或企业税来填补该州2600亿美元的预算缺口，此举缓解了部分商界领袖的担忧——此前佐兰·曼达尼在竞选中承诺将对纽约市最富有的居民和企业增税，并最终当选市长。【原文：New York Governor Kathy Hochul isn’t raising income or corporate taxes this year to fund the state’s $260 billion budget, easing concerns from some business leaders after Zohran Mamdani was elected mayor in a campaign that promised hikes on the city’s richest residents and businesses.】

item.title: Squarepoint聘请Gunvor前原油业务主管，加速进军石油领域
item.description: 专注量化投资的Squarepoint公司正以非传统方式进军金属领域，近日刚聘请了一位石油市场顶尖的实物交易员。【原文：Squarepoint, the quantitative-focused firm that’s making an unorthodox push into metals, has just hired one of the oil market’s top physical traders.】

item.title: 市场是否已准备好将地缘政治因素纳入定价？
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读本期通讯，这里汇集了Odd Lots世界每日精选内容。有时是我们——乔·韦森塔尔和特蕾西·阿洛威——为您解读市场、金融与经济领域的最新动态；有时则是来自我们专家嘉宾及信息源网络的深度贡献。无论内容形式如何，我们承诺始终为您带来精彩内容。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 塔布鲁克入股保险理赔公司MSA Mizar
item.description: 投资公司TowerBrook正收购保险理赔管理服务提供商MSA Mizar的多数股权，这是该公司自去年在米兰开设办事处以来在该国的首笔交易。【原文：Investment firm TowerBrook is acquiring a majority stake in MSA Mizar, an insurance claims management services provider, marking its first deal in the country since it opened an office in Milan last year.】

item.title: DeepMind首席执行官称中国人工智能企业落后西方6个月
item.description: 谷歌DeepMind首席执行官德米斯·哈萨比斯表示，中国人工智能公司尚未能突破技术前沿实现创新，其发展水平仍落后于西方顶尖实验室约半年。【原文：Google DeepMind Chief Executive Officer Demis Hassabis said Chinese artificial intelligence companies haven’t been able to innovate beyond the cutting edge of technology and remain about six months behind the frontier AI of the leading western labs.】

item.title: 蓝猫BDC推进4亿美元债务发售计划，为科技基金筹资
item.description: 蓝鸮资本公司旗下的一只私募信贷基金在一年内首次发行美元债券，而全球市场动荡不安的局势则令其他潜在借款方望而却步。【原文：A Blue Owl Capital Inc. private credit fund has launched its first dollar bond in a year, during a session in which global market jitters kept other potential borrowers on the sidelines.】

item.title: 达沃斯席卷的人工智能热潮从希望转向恐惧
item.description: 今年的世界经济论坛对科技的鼓吹声更甚，但也伴随着反思与忧虑。【原文：This year’s World Economic Forum features more cheerleading on the technology, but also introspection and worries.】

item.title: 哥伦布、希伦布兰德杠杆收购案进入垃圾债券市场
item.description: 哥伦布麦金农公司和希尔恩布兰德公司的收购方正通过垃圾债券市场筹集资金，以支持杠杆收购。【原文：Columbus McKinnon Corp. and the buyer of Hillenbrand Inc. are tapping the junk-bond market to help fund leveraged buyouts.】

item.title: Stripe联合创始人科利森称支付公司上市无需“仓促”
item.description: 支付处理公司Stripe的亿万富翁联合创始人兼总裁约翰·科利森表示，该公司目前没有上市计划。【原文：Stripe Inc. does not have imminent plans for a public listing, according to John Collison, the billionaire co-founder and president of the payment processing firm.】

item.title: 据称Qiagen正考虑战略选择，因新投资者表现出兴趣
item.description: 知情人士透露，欧洲分子检测公司Qiagen NV正权衡包括潜在出售在内的战略选择，此前该公司再度引发收购兴趣。【原文：Qiagen NV, the European molecular testing firm, is weighing strategic options including a potential sale amid fresh takeover interest, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 维托尔公司根据特朗普巨额协议首次从委内瑞拉海岸运出石油
item.description: 大宗商品贸易商维托尔集团首次从委内瑞拉岸上储油罐装运原油，此举旨在缓解运输瓶颈，为这个南美原油巨头的增产铺平道路。【原文：Commodities trader Vitol Group loaded its first oil cargo from Venezuela’s shore-based storage tanks, a move set to help clear bottlenecks and pave the way for the South American crude giant to ramp up production.】
